segments.text: This whole situation is making me incredibly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing relentlessly, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That water is going to cause serious damage if it's not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But even worse, the woman has one foot directly in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could easily slip and fall, perhaps injuring herself or breaking dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, perched precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly unstable; it's practically begging to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually angry that the adult is so completely unaware of these dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels irresponsible, almost negligent, to be so absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before a real accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a fall, an injury, or a flood is very high right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding just watching this tableau of impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to everyone in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
